trans-unit.source: Create ContentKeys with .NET
trans-unit.target: Create ContentKeys with .NET

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create content keys that provide secure access to Assets.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create content keys that provide secure access to Assets.

trans-unit.source: Create ContentKeys with .NET
trans-unit.target: Create ContentKeys with .NET

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: REST
trans-unit.target: REST

trans-unit.source: .NET
trans-unit.target: .NET

trans-unit.source: Media Services enables you to create and deliver encrypted assets.
trans-unit.target: Media Services enables you to create and deliver encrypted assets.

trans-unit.source: A **ContentKey** provides secure access to your **Asset**s.
trans-unit.target: A **ContentKey** provides secure access to your **Asset**s.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new asset (for example, before you [upload files](media-services-dotnet-upload-files.md)), you can specify the following encryption options: **StorageEncrypted**, **CommonEncryptionProtected**, or **EnvelopeEncryptionProtected**.
trans-unit.target: When you create a new asset (for example, before you [upload files](media-services-dotnet-upload-files.md)), you can specify the following encryption options: **StorageEncrypted**, **CommonEncryptionProtected**, or **EnvelopeEncryptionProtected**.

trans-unit.source: When you deliver assets to your clients, you can [configure for assets to be dynamically encrypted](media-services-dotnet-configure-asset-delivery-policy.md) with one of the following two encryptions: **DynamicEnvelopeEncryption** or **DynamicCommonEncryption**.
trans-unit.target: When you deliver assets to your clients, you can [configure for assets to be dynamically encrypted](media-services-dotnet-configure-asset-delivery-policy.md) with one of the following two encryptions: **DynamicEnvelopeEncryption** or **DynamicCommonEncryption**.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted assets have to be associated with **ContentKey**s.
trans-unit.target: Encrypted assets have to be associated with **ContentKey**s.

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to create a content key.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to create a content key.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] When creating a new **StorageEncrypted** asset using the Media Services .NET SDK , the **ContentKey** is automatically created and linked with the asset.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] When creating a new **StorageEncrypted** asset using the Media Services .NET SDK , the **ContentKey** is automatically created and linked with the asset.

trans-unit.source: ContentKeyType
trans-unit.target: ContentKeyType

trans-unit.source: One of the values that you must set when create a content key is the content key type.
trans-unit.target: One of the values that you must set when create a content key is the content key type.

trans-unit.source: Choose from one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: Choose from one of the following values.

trans-unit.source: Create envelope type ContentKey
trans-unit.target: Create envelope type ContentKey

trans-unit.source: The following code snippet creates a content key of the envelope encryption type.
trans-unit.target: The following code snippet creates a content key of the envelope encryption type.

trans-unit.source: It then associates the key with the specified asset.
trans-unit.target: It then associates the key with the specified asset.

trans-unit.target: call

trans-unit.target: Create common type ContentKey

trans-unit.target: The following code snippet creates a content key of the common encryption type.
